meanings.definition: Having the ability to create or design new things.
meanings.sent1: She is very inventive and always comes up with new ideas for her projects.
meanings.sent2: The inventor's inventive mind led to the creation of groundbreaking technology.
meanings.sent3: His inventive solutions to everyday problems never fail to impress his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her inventive approach to cooking turned the kitchen into a laboratory of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The artist's inventive use of colors made the painting truly unique.

meanings.definition: Showing creativity or originality in thinking.
meanings.sent1: The young writer's inventive stories captivated readers of all ages.
meanings.sent2: His inventive approach to problem-solving always surprises his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's inventive jokes had the audience laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her inventive way of looking at the world inspired many to think differently.
meanings.sent5: The designer's inventive fashion creations set new trends in the industry.
